choose.when: insert into board values (null,#{title},#{contents},'0',now(),(select max(g_no) from board a)+1,'1','1',#{user_no})

mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where no = #{no}
update board set o_no= o_no+1 where g_no = #{no} and depth != 1
update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, title, contents, user_no, g_no, o_no, depth from board where no = #{no}
select count(*) as totalpage from board

choose.when: select * from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc , o_no asc limit #{start_no},5
choose.otherwise: select * from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and concat(title,contents) like concat('%',#{kwd},'%') order by g_no desc , o_no asc limit #{start_no},5
